require.musicmetadata: Install 'musicmetadata' to have the song title and the song artist

error.notexists: Error: that directory does not exists

lib.starter:
Analyzing the library is needed. There are no song available.
Use: 
	addlib <absolutepath>
	analyze

cmd.wrong: Unknown command. Type 'help' for more info

help.addlib: Adds a folder to the library
help.addlibexc: Excludes a folder from the library
help.showlibs: Shows all the folders in the library
help.showexc: Shows all the excluded folders from the library
help.navFolder: Shows all the sub-folders of the given folder
help.navSongs: Shows all songs inside the give folder
help.queue: Adds a song to the playlist
help.list: Shows all current songs in the playlist
help.song: Displays the info of the given song
help.state: Shows the current state of the player
help.ip: Shows the Local IP in which the server is hosted
help.say: Sends a message to the chat

autoupdater.git_clone: You are using the git repository clone. Use 'git pull' to be up-to-date
autoupdater.check_out_dated: Your version is outdated. You have %1 of %2
autoupdater.update_not_installed: You already have the update. No need to download it

modals.serverDisInfo: This sign will dissapear if the server gets online in the next few minutes.
modals.exitConfirm: Are you sure you want to close the server?

login.must: You need to be logged in to do that

modal.connecProbInfo:
Either the server was disconnected, or there are problems in the local network.

This sign will close if the connection is resumed in the next few minutes.
modal.srvrLostInfo:
We completely lost connection to the server.

Refresh the page to access again
